duties_responsibilities.duty: Selling GE Healthcare CVUS products and/or services to healthcare partners.
Generating sales proposals, quotations, and presentations.
Maintaining after-sale relationships and communicating market intelligence.
Providing leadership in market analysis and development/execution of strategies.
Prospecting for new customers and growing existing customer portfolio.
Developing long-term customer relationships and identifying opportunities.

education_certification.credential: Bachelors Degree & 3 years of experience; OR High School Diploma/GED & 5 years of experience; OR Bachelors Degree & a graduate of GE HealthCare CLP
